constraints.name: distinct_elements
constraints.description: 序列中的所有元素互不相同
constraints.formal: ∀ i, j (1 ≤ i < j ≤ n) : a_i ≠ a_j

constraints.name: subsequence_length
constraints.description: 选择的子序列长度为 m

constraints.name: value_function
constraints.description: 子序列的价值定义为 ∑(m * a_{b_i}) - ∑∑ f(min(b_i, b_j), max(b_i, b_j))，其中 f(i, j) 表示 a[i] 到 a[j] 之间的最小值
constraints.formal: value(b) = ∑_{i=1}^m (m * a_{b_i}) - ∑_{i=1}^m ∑_{j=1}^m f(min(b_i, b_j), max(b_i, b_j))
